reuters.title: EC OPENS SPECIAL REBATE FOR MAIZE - PARIS TRADE
reuters.body: The EC Commission decided to open a special daily export rebate today for maize exports to Morocco, Israel, Canary Islands and zone 5c (Sub-Saharan Africa), trade sources said here. The rebate was set at 153 European currency units per tonne for March and 133 for April through July. Reuter 
